item.description:
“Marvel’s The Avengers” is as close as a movie can come to the fantastical reality of a good comic book, writes film critic Wesley Morris. (Boston Globe), who rates the movie 3 out of 4 stars.

Let's meet at 3:30 pm inside the theater doorway on the right-hand side.  The movie can be seen in 2D at 3:35 p.m.  The movie can be seen in 3D at 3:45 p.m.

Iron Man (Robert Downey), Captain America (Chris Evans) and Thor (Chris Hemsworth) team with the world’s greatest superheroes to save humanity from trickster god Loki and his alien army. Also, Hulk (Mark Ruffalo) & Scarlet Johanson star.

After the movie, let's go out to eat at a local restaurant that people agree would be reasonably priced & have good food.  (Olive Garden, Lonestar, Chipotle, Margaritas etc.)

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Movie Matinee (The Avengers: Iron Man, Captain America, Hulk) & dinner afterward
